014package org.microbean.construct;
015
016import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
017import java.lang.constant.Constable;
018import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
019import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Objects;
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
027import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
028
029import java.util.function.Supplier;
030
031import javax.annotation.processing.ProcessingEnvironment;
032
033import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
034import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
035import javax.lang.model.element.ModuleElement;
036import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
037import javax.lang.model.element.Parameterizable;
038import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
039
040import javax.lang.model.util.Elements;
041import javax.lang.model.util.Elements.Origin;
042import javax.lang.model.util.Types;
043
044import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
045import javax.lang.model.type.ExecutableType;
046import javax.lang.model.type.PrimitiveType;
047import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
048import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
049
050import org.microbean.construct.element.StringName;
051import org.microbean.construct.element.UniversalElement;
052
053import org.microbean.construct.type.UniversalType;
054
055import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
056
057/**
058 * A {@linkplain Domain domain of Java constructs} that can be used at annotation processing time or at runtime.
059 *
060 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson" target="_top">Laird Nelson</a>
061 *
062 * @see Domain
063 *
064 * @see RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier
065 */
066@SuppressWarnings({ "try", "unchecked" })
067public class DefaultDomain implements Constable, Domain {
068
069  private final Supplier<? extends ProcessingEnvironment> pe;
070
071  private final Supplier<? extends Unlockable> locker;
072
073  /**
074   * Creates a new {@link DefaultDomain} <strong>for use at runtime</strong>.
075   *
076   * @see #DefaultDomain(ProcessingEnvironment, Lock)
077   */
078  public DefaultDomain() {
079    this(null, null);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Creates a new {@link DefaultDomain} <strong>normally for use at annotation processing time</strong>, whose usage
084   * type is actually determined by the argument supplied to this constructor.
085   *
086   * @param pe a {@link ProcessingEnvironment}; may be {@code null} in which case the return value of an invocation of
087   * {@link Supplier#get()} on the return value of an invocation of {@link RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier#of()}
088   * will be used instead
089   *
090   * @see #DefaultDomain(ProcessingEnvironment, Lock)
091   *
092   * @see SymbolCompletionLock
093   */
094  public DefaultDomain(final ProcessingEnvironment pe) {
095    this(pe, null);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Creates a new {@link DefaultDomain} <strong>for use at runtime</strong>.
100   *
101   * @param lock a {@link Lock} to use to serialize symbol completion; may be {@code null} in which case a global {@link
102   * ReentrantLock} will be used instead
103   *
104   * @see #DefaultDomain(ProcessingEnvironment, Lock)
105   *
106   * @see RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier
107   *
108   * @see SymbolCompletionLock
109   */
110  public DefaultDomain(final Lock lock) {
111    this(null, lock);
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Creates a new {@link DefaultDomain} <strong>normally for use at annotation processing time</strong>, whose usage
116   * type is actually determined by the arguments supplied to this constructor.
117   *
118   * @param pe a {@link ProcessingEnvironment}; may be {@code null} in which case the return value of an invocation of
119   * {@link Supplier#get()} on the return value of an invocation of {@link RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier#of()}
120   * will be used instead
121   *
122   * @param lock a {@link Lock} to use to serialize symbol completion; if {@code null} and {@code pe} is {@code null},
123   * then a global {@link ReentrantLock} will be used instead; if {@code null} and {@code pe} is non-{@code null}, then
124   * no serialization of symbol completion will occur <strong>and this {@link DefaultDomain} therefore will not be safe
125   * for concurrent use by multiple threads</strong>
126   *
127   * @see RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier
128   *
129   * @see SymbolCompletionLock
130   */
131  public DefaultDomain(final ProcessingEnvironment pe, final Lock lock) {
132    super();
133    if (pe == null) {
134      this.pe = RuntimeProcessingEnvironmentSupplier.of();
135      final Lock l = lock == null ? SymbolCompletionLock.INSTANCE : lock;
136      this.locker = () -> {
137        l.lock();
138        return l::unlock;
139      };
140    } else {
141      this.pe = () -> pe;
142      this.locker = lock == null ? DefaultDomain::noopLock : () -> {
143        lock.lock();
144        return lock::unlock;
145      };
146    }
147  }
148
149
150  /*
151   * Instance methods.
152   */
153
154
155  @Override // Domain
156  public List<? extends UniversalElement> allMembers(TypeElement e) {
157    e = unwrap(e);
158    try (var lock = lock()) {
159      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getAllMembers(e), this);
160    }
161  }
162  
163  /**
164   * Returns a {@link UniversalType} representing an {@link javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType} whose {@linkplain
165   * javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType#getComponentType() component type} {@linkplain #sameType(TypeMirror, TypeMirror) is
166   * the same as} the supplied {@link TypeMirror}.
167   *
168   * @param t a {@link TypeMirror} representing a {@linkplain javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType#getComponentType()
169   * component type}; must not be {@code null}
170   *
171   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link UniversalType}
172   *
173   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code t} is {@code null}
174   *
175   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code t} is unsuitable for use as a {@linkplain
176   * javax.lang.model.type.ArrayType#getComponentType() component type}
177   *
178   * @see Types#getArrayType(TypeMirror)
179   */
180  @Override // Domain
181  public UniversalType arrayTypeOf(TypeMirror t) {
182    t = unwrap(t);
183    try (var lock = lock()) {
184      return UniversalType.of(this.types().getArrayType(t), this);
185    }
186  }
187
188  @Override // Domain
189  public UniversalType asMemberOf(DeclaredType containingType, Element e) {
190    containingType = unwrap(containingType);
191    e = unwrap(e);
192    try (var lock = lock()) {
193      return UniversalType.of(this.types().asMemberOf(containingType, e), this);
194    }
195  }
196
197  @Override // Domain
198  // Note the strange positioning of payload and receiver.
199  public boolean assignable(TypeMirror payload, TypeMirror receiver) {
200    payload = unwrap(payload);
201    receiver = unwrap(receiver);
202    try (var lock = lock()) {
203      return this.types().isAssignable(payload, receiver);
204    }
205  }
206
207  @Override // Domain
208  public StringName binaryName(TypeElement e) {
209    e = unwrap(e);
210    try (var lock = lock()) {
211      return StringName.of(this.elements().getBinaryName(e).toString(), this);
212    }
213  }
214
215  @Override // Domain
216  public boolean bridge(ExecutableElement e) {
217    e = unwrap(e);
218    try (var lock = lock()) {
219      return this.elements().isBridge(e);
220    }
221  }
222
223  @Override // Domain
224  public UniversalType capture(TypeMirror t) {
225    t = unwrap(t);
226    try (var lock = lock()) {
227      return UniversalType.of(this.types().capture(t), this);
228    }
229  }
230
231  @Override // Domain
232  public boolean contains(TypeMirror t0, TypeMirror t1) {
233    t0 = unwrap(t0);
234    t1 = unwrap(t1);
235    try (var lock = lock()) {
236      return this.types().contains(t0, t1);
237    }
238  }
239
240  // (Convenience.)
241  @Override // Domain
242  public UniversalType declaredType(final CharSequence canonicalName) {
243    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.declaredType(canonicalName), this);
244  }
245
246  @Override // Domain
247  public UniversalType declaredType(TypeElement typeElement,
248                                    TypeMirror... typeArguments) {
249    typeElement = unwrap(typeElement);
250    typeArguments = unwrap(typeArguments);
251    try (var lock = lock()) {
252      return UniversalType.of(this.types().getDeclaredType(typeElement, typeArguments), this);
253    }
254  }
255
256  @Override // Domain
257  public UniversalType declaredType(DeclaredType enclosingType,
258                                    TypeElement typeElement,
259                                    TypeMirror... typeArguments) {
260    enclosingType = unwrap(enclosingType);
261    typeElement = unwrap(typeElement);
262    typeArguments = unwrap(typeArguments);
263    try (var lock = lock()) {
264      return UniversalType.of(this.types().getDeclaredType(enclosingType, typeElement, typeArguments), this);
265    }
266  }
267
268  @Override // Constable
269  public Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
270    return
271      Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
272                                         MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(ClassDesc.of(this.getClass().getName()))));
273  }
274
275  @Override // Domain
276  public List<? extends UniversalType> directSupertypes(TypeMirror t) {
277    t = unwrap(t);
278    try (var lock = lock()) {
279      return UniversalType.of(this.types().directSupertypes(t), this);
280    }
281  }
282
283  @Override // Domain
284  public UniversalElement element(TypeMirror t) {
285    t = unwrap(t);
286    try (var lock = lock()) {
287      return UniversalElement.of(this.types().asElement(t), this);
288    }
289  }
290
291  @Override // Domain
292  public UniversalType elementType(final TypeMirror t) {
293    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.elementType(t), this);
294  }
295
296  // Non-private for testing only.
297  final Elements elements() {
298    return this.pe().getElementUtils();
299  }
300
301  @Override // Object
302  public boolean equals(final Object other) {
303    if (this == other) {
304      return true;
305    } else if (other != null && other.getClass() == this.getClass()) {
306      final DefaultDomain her = (DefaultDomain)other;
307      return
308        Objects.equals(this.pe(), her.pe()) &&
309        Objects.equals(this.locker, her.locker);
310    } else {
311      return false;
312    }
313  }
314
315  @Override // Domain
316  public UniversalType erasure(TypeMirror t) {
317    t = unwrap(t);
318    try (var lock = lock()) {
319      return UniversalType.of(this.types().erasure(t), this);
320    }
321  }
322
323  // (Convenience.)
324  @Override // Domain
325  public UniversalElement executableElement(final TypeElement declaringElement,
326                                            final TypeMirror returnType,
327                                            final CharSequence name,
328                                            final TypeMirror... parameterTypes) {
329    return UniversalElement.of(Domain.super.executableElement(declaringElement, returnType, name, parameterTypes), this);
330  }
331
332  @Override // Object
333  public int hashCode() {
334    return this.pe().hashCode() ^ this.locker.hashCode();
335  }
336
337  // (Convenience.)
338  @Override // Domain
339  public UniversalElement javaLangObject() {
340    return UniversalElement.of(Domain.super.javaLangObject(), this);
341  }
342
343  // (Convenience.)
344  @Override // Domain
345  public UniversalType javaLangObjectType() {
346    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.javaLangObjectType(), this);
347  }
348
349  /**
350   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link Unlockable} that should be used in a {@code try}-with-resources block guarding
351   * operations that might cause symbol completion.
352   *
353   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link Unlockable}
354   *
355   * @see Unlockable#close()
356   */
357  public final Unlockable lock() {
358    return this.locker.get();
359  }
360
361  // (Canonical.)
362  @Override // Domain
363  public UniversalElement moduleElement(final CharSequence canonicalName) {
364    try (var lock = lock()) {
365      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getModuleElement(canonicalName), this);
366    }
367  }
368
369  // (Canonical.)
370  @Override // Domain
371  public StringName name(final CharSequence name) {
372    return switch (name) {
373    case StringName sn -> sn;
374    // You will be tempted to add other efficient cases here. Do not.
375    default -> {
376      try (var lock = lock()) {
377        yield StringName.of(this.elements().getName(name).toString(), this);
378      }
379    }
380    };
381  }
382
383  // (Canonical.)
384  @Override // Domain
385  public UniversalType noType(final TypeKind kind) {
386    return UniversalType.of(this.types().getNoType(kind), this);
387  }
388
389  // (Canonical.)
390  @Override // Domain
391  public UniversalType nullType() {
392    return UniversalType.of(this.types().getNullType(), this);
393  }
394
395  @Override // Domain
396  public Origin origin(Element e) {
397    e = unwrap(e);
398    try (var lock = lock()) {
399      return this.elements().getOrigin(e);
400    }
401  }
402

405  public UniversalElement packageElement(final CharSequence canonicalName) {
406    try (var lock = lock()) {
407      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getPackageElement(canonicalName), this);
408    }
409  }
410

412  @Override // Domain
413  public UniversalElement packageElement(ModuleElement asSeenFrom, final CharSequence canonicalName) {
414    asSeenFrom = unwrap(asSeenFrom);
415    try (var lock = lock()) {
416      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getPackageElement(asSeenFrom, canonicalName), this);
417    }
418  }
419
420  private final ProcessingEnvironment pe() {
421    return this.pe.get();
422  }
423
424  // (Canonical.)
425  @Override // Domain
426  public UniversalType primitiveType(final TypeKind kind) {
427    return UniversalType.of(this.types().getPrimitiveType(kind), this);
428  }

433  public UniversalType primitiveType(final CharSequence canonicalName) {
434    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.primitiveType(canonicalName), this);
435  }

441    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.primitiveType(e), this);
442  }
443
444  // (Canonical.)
445  // (Unboxing.)
446  @Override // Domain
447  public UniversalType primitiveType(TypeMirror t) {
448    t = unwrap(t);
449    try (var lock = lock()) {
450      return UniversalType.of(this.types().unboxedType(t), this);
451    }
452  }
453
454  @Override // Domain
455  public UniversalType rawType(final TypeMirror t) {
456    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.rawType(t), this);
457  }
458
459  // (Canonical.)
460  @Override // Domain
461  public UniversalElement recordComponentElement(ExecutableElement e) {
462    e = unwrap(e);
463    try (var lock = lock()) {
464      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().recordComponentFor(e), this);
465    }
466  }
467
468  @Override // Domain
469  public boolean sameType(TypeMirror t0, TypeMirror t1) {
470    if (t0 == t1) {
471      // Critical; javax.lang.model.Types#isSameType(TypeMirror, TypeMirror) returns false here, on purpose, if the two
472      // identical references are wildcards. This is almost never what anyone wants.
473      return true;
474    } else if (t0 == null || t1 == null) {
475      return false;
476    }
477    t0 = unwrap(t0);
478    t1 = unwrap(t1);
479    try (var lock = lock()) {
480      return this.types().isSameType(t0, t1);
481    }
482  }
483
484  @Override // Domain
485  public boolean subsignature(ExecutableType t0, ExecutableType t1) {
486    t0 = unwrap(t0);
487    t1 = unwrap(t1);
488    try (var lock = lock()) {
489      return this.types().isSubsignature(t0, t1);
490    }
491  }
492
493  @Override // Domain
494  public boolean subtype(TypeMirror candidateSubtype, TypeMirror candidateSupertype) {
495    candidateSubtype = unwrap(candidateSubtype);
496    candidateSupertype = unwrap(candidateSupertype);
497    try (var lock = lock()) {
498      return this.types().isSubtype(candidateSubtype, candidateSupertype);
499    }
500  }
501
502  @Override // Domain
503  public String toString(final CharSequence name) {
504    return switch (name) {
505    case null -> null;
506    case String s -> s;
507    case StringName sn -> sn.value();
508    case Name n -> {
509      try (var lock = lock()) {
510        yield n.toString();
511      }
512    }
513    default -> name.toString();
514    };
515  }
516
517  // (Canonical.)
518  @Override // Domain
519  public UniversalElement typeElement(final CharSequence canonicalName) {
520    try (var lock = lock()) {
521      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getTypeElement(switch (canonicalName.toString()) {
522          case "boolean" -> "java.lang.Boolean";
523          case "byte" -> "java.lang.Byte";
524          case "char" -> "java.lang.Character";
525          case "double" -> "java.lang.Double";
526          case "float" -> "java.lang.Float";
527          case "int" -> "java.lang.Integer";
528          case "long" -> "java.lang.Long";
529          case "short" -> "java.lang.Short";
530          default -> canonicalName;
531          }), this);
532    }
533  }
534
535  // (Canonical.)
536  @Override // Domain
537  public UniversalElement typeElement(ModuleElement asSeenFrom, final CharSequence canonicalName) {
538    asSeenFrom = unwrap(asSeenFrom);
539    try (var lock = lock()) {
540      return UniversalElement.of(this.elements().getTypeElement(asSeenFrom, switch (canonicalName.toString()) {
541          case "boolean" -> "java.lang.Boolean";
542          case "byte" -> "java.lang.Byte";
543          case "char" -> "java.lang.Character";
544          case "double" -> "java.lang.Double";
545          case "float" -> "java.lang.Float";
546          case "int" -> "java.lang.Integer";
547          case "long" -> "java.lang.Long";
548          case "short" -> "java.lang.Short";
549          default -> canonicalName;
550          }), this);
551    }
552  }
553
554  // (Canonical.)
555  // (Boxing.)
556  @Override // Domain
557  public UniversalElement typeElement(PrimitiveType t) {
558    t = unwrap(t);
559    try (var lock = lock()) {
560      return UniversalElement.of(this.types().boxedClass(t), this);
561    }
562  }
563
564  // (Convenience.)
565  // (Boxing.)
566  @Override // Domain
567  public UniversalElement typeElement(final TypeKind primitiveTypeKind) {
568    return UniversalElement.of(Domain.super.typeElement(primitiveTypeKind), this);
569  }
570
571  // (Convenience.)
572  @Override // Domain
573  public UniversalElement typeParameterElement(final Parameterizable p, final CharSequence name) {
574    return UniversalElement.of(Domain.super.typeParameterElement(p, name), this);
575  }
576
577  // Non-private for testing only.
578  final Types types() {
579    return this.pe().getTypeUtils();
580  }
581
582  // (Convenience.)
583  @Override // Domain
584  public UniversalType typeVariable(final Parameterizable p, final CharSequence name) {
585    return UniversalType.of(Domain.super.typeVariable(p, name), this);
586  }
587
588  // (Convenience.)
589  @Override // Domain
590  public UniversalElement variableElement(final Element e, final CharSequence name) {
591    return UniversalElement.of(Domain.super.variableElement(e, name), this);
592  }
593
594  @Override // Domain
595  public UniversalType wildcardType() {
596    return this.wildcardType(null, null);
597  }
598
599  @Override // Domain
600  public UniversalType wildcardType(TypeMirror extendsBound, TypeMirror superBound) {
601    extendsBound = unwrap(extendsBound);
602    superBound = unwrap(superBound);
603    try (var lock = lock()) {
604      return UniversalType.of(this.types().getWildcardType(extendsBound, superBound), this);
605    }
606  }
607
608
609  /*
610   * Static methods.
611   */
612
613
614  private static final void doNothing() {}
615
616  private static final Unlockable noopLock() {
617    return DefaultDomain::doNothing;
618  }
619
620  private static final <T extends TypeMirror> T unwrap(final T t) {
621    return UniversalType.unwrap(t);
622  }
623
624  private static final <E extends Element> E unwrap(final E e) {
625    return UniversalElement.unwrap(e);
626  }
627
628  private static final TypeMirror[] unwrap(final TypeMirror[] ts) {
629    if (ts == null || ts.length <= 0) {
630      return ts;
631    }
632    final TypeMirror[] rv = new TypeMirror[ts.length];
633    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; i++) {
634      rv[i] = unwrap(ts[i]);
635    }
636    return rv;
637  }
638
639}
